accessDeniedError2.description: Message shown when the server denies access (unclear reason)
accessDeniedError2.message: The server sent an 'Access denied' message - please check your email and password in the options dialog and try again.

addToDictionaryTitle.description: Title hover shown in the popup to accept a word to the internal dictionary

appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: Verifica i tuoi testi per problemi di ortografia e grammatica ovunque sul web.

appName.description: The name of the application, displayed in the web store.

appStoreDesc1.description: Description item 1 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc1.message: Finds many errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect

appStoreDesc10.description: Description paragraph 1 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc10.message: Con questa estensione puoi controllare il testo con lo stile libero e il correttore grammaticale LanguageTool. LanguageTool trova molti errori che un semplice correttore ortografico non è in grado di rilevare, come mescolare, o ripetere una parola, e può rilevare alcuni problemi grammaticali. Supporta più di 25 lingue tra cui inglese, spagnolo, francese, tedesco, polacco e russo.

appStoreDesc2.description: Description item 2 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)

appStoreDesc20.description: Description paragraph 2 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc20.message: LanguageTool is designed with simplicity in mind. With the press of a button or customisable keyboard shortcut, LanguageTool instantly checks the spelling and grammar of any text that is selected. LanguageTool is compatible with almost all text, regardless of source, including social networks such as Twitter or LinkedIn and online e-mail services, such as Gmail. Very few sites like docs.google.com and chrome.google.com currently aren't supported - please use https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/languagetool/kjcoklfhicmkbfifghaecedbohbmofkm for Google Docs instead.

appStoreDesc3.description: Description item 3 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)

appStoreDesc30.description: Description paragraph 3 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc30.message: With LanguageTool our aim is to give users a fully-featured grammar checker and proofreader that will enable them to have control and confidence over their content. While LanguageTool is a vital extension for non-native speakers, it’s also smart enough to recognize mistakes that native speakers commonly make and it will improve your writing overall. This grammar and spelling correction works across all variations of common language; distinguishing between U.S. and British English, for instance. LanguageTool also features a personal dictionary for exceptions or words that you might commonly use but that are not found in a conventional dictionary. LanguageTool will recognize these words in future grammar checking and proofreading.

appStoreDesc4.description: Description item 4 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc4.message: Works on almost any website including Gmail, Facebook, twitter

appStoreDesc5.description: Description paragraph 0 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc5.message: Utilizzatore di Google Docs? Per favore usa https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/languagetool/kjcoklfhicmkbfifghaecedbohbmofkm

appStoreDesc60.description: Description paragraph 5 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc60.message: A differenza di Grammarly, LanguageTool funziona per molte lingue e offre molti delle stessi funzionalità.

appStoreDesc70.description: Description paragraph 6 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc70.message: Your privacy is important to us: By default, this extension will check your text by sending it to https://languagetool.org over a securely encrypted connection. No account is needed to use this extension. We don't store your IP address. See https://languagetool.org/privacy/ for our privacy policy.

appStoreDesc80.description: Description paragraph 7 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc80.message: List of supported languages: English (Australian, Canadian, GB, New Zealand, South African, US), French, German (Austria, Germany, Swiss), Asturian, Belarusian, Breton, Catalan (also Valencian), Chinese, Danish, Dutch, Esperanto, Galician, Greek, Italian, Japanese, Khmer, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil, Portugal, Angola, Mozambique), Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Tagalog, Tamil, Ukrainian

autoCheckDesc.description: Options dialog: auto-check on all domains by default
autoCheckDesc.message: Auto-check su tutti i domini per impostazione predefinita

autoCheckOnDomainsDesc.description: Options dialog: text for the textarea with the domains's where the check text will run automatically in background
autoCheckOnDomainsDesc.message: Auto-check del testo su questi domini (un dominio per riga):
